item.title: Modeling Metastasis
item.description: Predicting cancer outcomes in Merkel Cell Carcinoma Consulting project for Insight’s Health Data Science program Github | Web app | Demo Merkel cell carcinoma is a rare but aggressive form of skin cancer - itâ€™s five times more deadly than more common skin cancers, like melanoma.

item.title: Building a Website with Blogdown, Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: A few months ago, I attended an R ladies NYC workshop on creating websites with Blogdown and Hugo themes. with For the R user who is looking to generate their own webpage - look no further!

item.title: Shiny app for longitudinal studies
item.description: Interactive web application for psychology researchers Github | Web app In developmental psychology, it’s common to collect data from the same participants over time to measure developmental milestones of interest.
